roleset.name: make complicated

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to become complicated

example.name: transitive
example.text: Cray Research's decision to link its $98.3 million promissory note to Mr. Cray's presence will complicate a valuation of the new company.
example.arg: Cray Research's decision to link its $98.3 million promissory note to Mr. Cray's presence
a valuation of the new company.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: [The new round of bidding]-1 would seem *trace*-1 to complicate the decision making for Judge James Yacos.

roleset.note: Be careful for adjectival "complicated" usages confused with verbal"complicated" usages.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'complicate' based on survey of sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry.
